analysis.description:
DiceLuck100._open (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#247-273) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (game.bets[i].addr).send(game.bets[i].winAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#268)

DiceLuck100._eg (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#173) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- _placeBet (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#204-232)

DiceLuck100._open (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#247-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(openBN == game.openBlockNumber && game.openNumber == 0 && betNum == txNum,invalid bet)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(openBN == game.openBlockNumber && game.openNumber == 0 && betNum == txNum,invalid bet)

analysis.description:
DiceLuck100._open has external calls inside a loop:
	- (game.bets[i].addr).send(game.bets[i].winAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#268)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#59-60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable._transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0xa093e7943b942eb82f0a24ee3022aaf8217fe527.sol#67-68) is not in mixedCase
